Description.Text: Handsome Hotel is a classic 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Paris. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and a good location near the Pompidou Centre. The 1st arrondissement is an old and illustrious central district dominated by the Tuileries Garden. Nearby places of interest include the world-famous Louvre Museum, the Musee de l'Orangerie, Palais-Royal and Place Vendome. Les Halles metro and RER stations are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a classic mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Beautiful rooms are approximately 14sqm, cosy and decorated in a contemporary style with beige and pink tones. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
